name: Walinong Sari
description:
Walinong Sari resided in Inderapura, a part of the Old Pahang Kingdom. She was praised for having a strong personality and the appearance of a princess. Despite combat prowess, she is a homebody with her devoted husband and one daughter. The spouse abruptly abducted her daughter and fled to his kingdom. She set out to rescue her daughter from her evil spouse using her powers.

The spouse left a note saying he was taking their daughter into his kingdom. Walinong sari did not have a good feeling about the note as she sense a dreadful aura from the note. She knows the Raja Mambang kingdom is not a good place for their people.

Puteri Walinong Sari starts embarking on her adventure to find her daughter. She must pursue her spouse before they got to the kingdom. While on the journey she fights bandits and demons that are blocking her path.
